text: Tamen zhong you qingting ni de, wo zai tamen de xin shang jia mengbi, yimian tamen liaojie “gulanjing”. You zai tamen de er zhong zao zhong ting. Tamen jishi kanjian-qie jixiang, tamen ye bu hui quexin. Dengdao tamen lai he ni bianlun de shihou, bu xindao de ren shuo:`Zhe zhishi guren de shenhua.'
